snippet: Documents obtained by an advocacy group question the handling of animals used in the production of the canceled series “Luck.”
abstract: HBO comes under renewed scrutiny for the treatment of horses on Luck, its recently canceled dramatic series set in the world of gambling and horse racing; documents obtained by advocacy group People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals once again question the handling of animals used in the series and the qualifications of professionals charged with looking after them.
lead_paragraph: Documents obtained by an advocacy group question the handling of animals used in the production of the canceled series “Luck.”
